name: Build Private Store For Woocommerce
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Build Private Store For Woocommerce using to in woocommerce to particular user role or category, tag, product to purchase that.

Build Private Store For Woocommerce is a simple plugin that will help you create private access to preferred customers. A guest customer wonâ€™t be able to see the private products, and they will have to register in your store to be able to view them. You will be able to apply these settings globally across your entire site or only to specific categories, tags or pages.

FEATURES FOR BUILD PRIVATE STORE FOR WOOCOMMERCE:

  • Easy Setup
  • Private Products And Private Page.
  • Customize Login Title, Register Title.
  • Manually approve new customers registration.
  • Account Approve Email, Account Reject Email.
  • Login To price Show.
  • Custom Text Add Login With Color customized.
  • Disable user login access.
  • Guest users wonâ€™t be able to view the protected area.
  • Restrict access to your store products for guest users.
  • Restrict content and product access only to members.
  • Enable/Disable Approve Email.
  • Enable/Disable Reject Email.
  • Enable/Disable Email For Administrator.
  • Set Custom User Login Redirect Url.
  • Set User Register Email subject, body.
  • WPML Support

ðŸŒŸ Documentation | ðŸŒŸ Demo | ðŸŒŸ Get Pro | ðŸŒŸ Support

FEATURES FOR BUILD PRIVATE STORE FOR WOOCOMMERCE PREMIUM:

  • Manually add category product in Login To price Show.
  • Manually add tag product in Login To price Show.
  • Change Account Reject Email subject, body, title.
  • Change Account Approve Email subject, body, title.

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

The Build Private Store For Woocommerce is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize woocommerce even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here

How to Use Build Private Store For Woocommerce

This plugin is used to secure all pages.
